QuestData.Title: The Ballad of Liu Lang
QuestData.Description: Dear $p,$b$bAt long last thanks to your research we have the full Ballad of Liu Lang.$b$bIf you visit us at the Seat of Knowledge in Vale of Eternal Blossoms we can add this contribution to your personal collection.$b$bThank you for your diligence!$b$bSincerely,$b$bLorewalker Cho
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring The Ballad of Liu Lang to Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Knowledge.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Kowledge in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
